Telex: Although not as common today, a Telex machine could be used to send a printed document to another country.
Cablegram: Another option could be to use a cablegram service to send a message through a telegraph network.
Messenger services: You could use a messenger service to deliver a physical message to the person in another country.
Hand delivery: If possible, you could travel to the person's location to deliver the message personally.
International phone booths: In some areas, international phone booths may still be available to make a call to another country.
